Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is vulnerable, and must save or take take 1 piercing damage for each space they move until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Riven
Actions.Mark: At the end of that character's turn, if they are still marked, they take [D] piercing damage, once, for every 3 spaces of distance between them and the justicar. Then, clear the mark.
